answers:
Ethics is a growing area of interest in technology in general, as technology becomes an increasingly integral part of our lives. 

Ethics is not an area of interest in technology.

Ethics can be an area of interest in technology, as the use of technology is optional and not essential.
choices.question: Is ethics a growing area of interest in technology?
Is technology ethically neautral?
answers:
Technology is not ethically neutral and reflects the values of the designer. 

Technology is ethically neutral and the designer values are not related to his invention.

Technology can be ethically neutral.
